name: Space Invasion AR
description:
Space Invasion AR is a modern interpretation of old school arcade game. It brings old-school gaming into the future with your iOS device.

You can fight hundreds of enemies around you using only your iPhone or iPad. Just look around to find the enemy and tap the screen to shoot and destroy. It's simple, addictive, fast and rewarding.

Fight the enemies, unlock all invaders and beat your high scores! There are many types of invaders from all over the world to find. Can you unlock the invader from your country? There is only one way to find out!
